ygData.subject: Re: Piercing or blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Good advice.  Any idea where one can hunt for the Stiletto?  I ve been planning to use 2H Blunt until I m forced to use a hand for a good tome, skull, or
ygData.messageBody:
Good advice. Any idea where one can hunt for the Stiletto? I've been
planning to use 2H Blunt until I'm forced to use a hand for a good tome,
skull, or idol....but might was well start looking now.

-- Lim'Dul

Message: 16
Date: Wed, 12 May 1999 09:32:48 +0200
From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
Subject: Re: Piercing or blunt?

>But do not invest too heavily in two-handed weapons. There appear to be
>goodies
>that are a must in your off-hand. My best bet would be the Fanged Skull
>Stiletto
(damage ratio: 0.5!!!, double of runed staff), one of the favorite >Rogue
weapons... that we happen to be able to wield :)

>But that one is a lot further down the road :(
